sourcesContent:
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-homepage', templateUrl: './homepage.component.html', styleUrls: ['./homepage.component.css'] }) export class HomepageComponent implements OnInit{ scrollAmount : number = 320; sConst = document.querySelector(".horizontal-row"); hScroll = document.querySelector(".horizontal-scroll"); ngOnInit(): void { // let currentScrollPosition = 0; // let maxScroll = -sConst.offSetWidth + hScroll.offSetWidth; } scrollHorizontally(val: any){ let currentScrollPosition = 0; // let maxScroll = -this.sConst?. + this.hScroll?; currentScrollPosition += ( val * this.scrollAmount) if(currentScrollPosition > 0) { currentScrollPosition = 0; } this.sConst?.scrollLeft; } }

You'll never travel without our trip planner again

Build, organize, and map your itineraries in a free travel app designed for vacations & road trips

Your itinerary and your map in one view

No more switching between different apps, tabs, and tools to keep track of your travel plans.

What travelers are raving about

Features to replace all your other tools
